name: BoxWave
tag_list: cases, case, covers, cover, tablet, phone, iphone, ipad, stylus, styluses, screen-protector, keyboard-buddy
overview:
BoxWave designs and sells accessories for over 3,500 electronic devices.

Their online website and Amazon listings feature cases, covers, screen protectors, styluses, and other accessories for tablets, phones, cameras, etc.

BoxWave is best known for their ClearTouch screen protector products as well as for being one of the first to manufacture a high quality capacitive stylus.

Recently their Keyboard Buddy for both the iPad 2 and iPhone 4 was featured by David Pogue of the NY Times on LIVE with Kelly.

BoxWave is consistently looking for new products and new devices to create products for. Their website features a submission section where users can contribute to the innovation.

BoxWave: Tomorrow’s Products Today
